offer_summary.company_name: ZOOLA TECH POLAND sp. z o.o.
offer_summary.location: remote work - Набір відкритий для українців
offer_summary.job_description: As a Lead Frontend Engineer, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and deploying innovative frontend solutions that enhance the functionality and user experience of our advanced AI assistant platform. This role requires a blend of creativity, technical expertise, and a passion for innovation.
requirements: Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field
Proven experience as a Frontend Engineer with a strong portfolio showcasing your work on complex web applications
requiered_skills: React, TypeScript, Next.JS, GraphQL, Tailwind CSS, and HTML proficiency
Familiarity with Azure or other cloud services
Strong understanding of software development lifecycle and agile methodologies
Excellent problem-solving skills, strategic thinking, and innovation
Exceptional communication and collaboration skills, continuous learning mindset
